titleStmt.title: Motives to holy living, or, Heads for meditation divided into consideratins, counsels, duties : together with some forms of devotion in litanies, collects, doxologies, &c.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Abraham Woodhead, who is in actuality R.H. cf. NUC pre-1956.
